com.jayway.restassured.config

Class ConnectionConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.restassured.config.ConnectionConfig

  • public class ConnectionConfig
extends Object
    Lets you configure connection settings for REST Assured. For example if you want to force-close the Apache HTTP Client connection after each response. You may want to do this if you make a lot of fast consecutive requests with small amount of data in the response. How ever if you're downloading large amount of (chunked) data you must not close connections after each response. By default connections are not closed after each response.

      Close open connections that have idled for the amount of time specified in this config.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionConfig

        public ConnectionConfig()
        Create a new connection configuration that doesn't close the HTTP connections after each response.

      • ConnectionConfig

        public ConnectionConfig(ConnectionConfig.CloseIdleConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionConfig)
        Create a new Connection configuration with the supplied settings.
        Parameters:
        closeIdleConnectionConfig - Configures REST Assured to close idle connections after each response. If null (default) then connections are not close after each response.

    • Method Detail

      • closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse

        public ConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse()
        Close open connections after each response. This is required if you plan to make a lot of consecutive requests with small response bodies. It can also be enabled if you never receive chunked HTTP responses.

      • closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponseAfter

        public ConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponseAfter(long idleTime,
                                                          TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Close open connections that have idled for the amount of time specified in this config after each response.
        Parameters:
        idleTime - The idle time of connections to be closed
        timeUnit - The time unit to for idleTime
        Returns:
        A new ConnectionConfig instance with the updated configuration

      • closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponseAfter

        public ConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponseAfter(ConnectionConfig.CloseIdleConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionConfig)
        Close open connections that have idled for the amount of time specified in this config after each response.
        Parameters:
        closeIdleConnectionConfig - The close connection configuration.
        Returns:
        A new ConnectionConfig instance with the updated configuration

      • dontCloseIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse

        public ConnectionConfig dontCloseIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse()
        Don't close idle connections after each request. This is the default configuration. If you downloading large amount of data using HTTP chunking this setting is required.
        Returns:
        A new ConnectionConfig instance with the updated configuration

      • closeIdleConnectionConfig

        public ConnectionConfig.CloseIdleConnectionConfig closeIdleConnectionConfig()
        Returns:
        The close connection configuration

      • shouldCloseIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse

        public boolean shouldCloseIdleConnectionsAfterEachResponse()

      • connectionConfig

        public static ConnectionConfig connectionConfig()
        Returns:
        A static way to create a new ConnectionConfig instance without calling "new" explicitly. Mainly for syntactic sugar.

      • and

        public ConnectionConfig and()
        Syntactic sugar.
        Returns:
        The same connection config instance.
